Modal dialogs

Modals are a flexible alert window, which disable interaction with the page behind them. Modals may include inputs or buttons or simply include text.

Arguments

title

A character string specifying the modalâ€™s title.

body

A character string specifying the body of the modal or custom element to use as the body of the modal, defaults to NULL.

footer

Custom tags to include at the bottom of the modal, defaults to NULL.

session

A reactive context, defaults to getDefaultReactiveDomain().
